description.value: This long, thin scarf is usually marked with an alternating pattern of light and dark shapes. While wearing a celestial stole, you gain cold resistance 5 or fire resistance 5 (your choice when you first don the stole); you can alter the type of energy resistance (choosing between cold and fire) once per day after 8 hours of rest. If you have cold or fire resistance from the solarianâ€™s solar armor solar manifestation, increase that resistance by 5.
